title.label: Got to pay to get past first few levels

content.label: Fun at first, but there is a clear pay wall to get to level 10 and beyond that requires you to pay for upgrades, otherwise you will just keep starting over at level 5. Replaying the same levels over and over gets old really fast.

title.label: Fun game but need optimization for iPhone X

content.label: Title says it all. The map and some text need to be optimized.
It has puzzles and challenges that you can do. When I first got the game I did not want to stop playing it. If you like puzzles and challenges this is the game for you.

title.label: This is actually a really fun game

content.label: I feel people are being way too harsh on this game, saying you canâ€™t see traps because you canâ€™t look down or you canâ€™t see far enough, or saying you find weapons all over the place and health packs and itâ€™s too easy or they think itâ€™s repetitive and boring. I understand if itâ€™s not your type of game, but honestly I love this game. The levels are short and simple, but exploring them and finding all the secret passages and treasures is fun. All the basic enemies are one hit kills so it seems like different weapon types are useless as they kill everything in one hit, but they do different amounts of damage to bosses, so the crossbow is going to be stronger and do more damage than a regular bow. People have also said the bosses always die in just 3 or 4 hits, but once you level up and buy more upgrades, the bosses get stronger and harder to beat so itâ€™s more challenging. With the weapons, yes theyâ€™re frequent, but the problem comes when theyâ€™re always different weapons that replace the one you have, and until you buy more weapon slots itâ€™s really hard because you may only have 4 hits with your sword before it breaks but there are 6-8 enemies and all the other chests may just have keys or coins or quest books, and now youâ€™re frantically trying to avoid traps or enemies to not die. This game starts off pretty easy but starts to require more strategy and skill the more you play. Just give it a chance
Iâ€™ve been playing this game nonstop since I found it a few months ago!
This game is sick af

This game is one of the most boring games I've ever played it's extremely repetitive. All you do is turn corners until you find the exit while dodging extremely difficult to see traps I mean difficult to see because of bad game design you can't look down so you only see a small corner of the trap. The monsters die in one hit that is if you managed to find one of the weapons that you rarely get that also break in one hit. Overall it's a terrible, mind numbing, repetitive game while playing it I could actually feel my frontal lobe getting numb and my higher functions ceasing.

title.label: Neat game, but needs an update...

content.label:
You have a great idea for a dungeon crawler, but you haven't had an update in a long time. I have some suggestions and bugs I need to tell you.

SUGGESTIONS:

â€¢More upgrades! Just a general suggestion.
â€¢More themes and monsters! The current ones get repetitive after a while.
â€¢Descriptions about pets! What I mean is that you should describe what pets do (and I mean the Killer Bunny pet), because I haven't really understood the concept of it until now. Also, I would like more pets and possible upgrades for them.
â€¢Better AI for mobs! Monsters should follow you when they see you and the food from quests should flee from you when you get close to them. Also, pets should follow you, too.
â€¢Buffs and nerfs for bosses! Some bosses REALLY need to be buffed/nerfed, such as the slime (nerf), statue (buff), spider (buff), and many others.
â€¢More arena themes! So far, there's only the jungle theme. Can you add more?

BUGS:

â€¢Chupacabra glitch! When killing the Chupacabra, red blocks don't explode everywhere. It just stays frozen where you can walk through it and vanishes. Can you fix this?
â€¢Jumping glitch! Whenever you jump at the same spot consecutively for too many times, you gradually start to sink, then you walk through the walls. Can you fix this?
â€¢Pipe glitch! Whenever I get out of the pipe that leads to the golden frog, sometimes I can't move and I have to restart the game to travel again. Can you fix this?
â€¢Health glitch! One time when I got out of the pipe to the golden frog, I got hit instantly by several monsters that were on the pipe, but I was still alive when I didn't have any hearts left. Can you fix this? Also, can you make the monsters avoid the pipe so this doesn't happen?

That's all the suggestions I could think of and bugs I could find, so hopefully you can update the game soon. See yah! ðŸ’£ðŸ”¨

This game is great outside of the bosses,but the boss fights are just terrible, the yeti is too easy, medusa is impossible because of how much the spits out this goddamn snakes and the slime is completely random, I really don't have the time or patience to mention the other TERRIBLE bosses here, but please remove the bosses, the game would be a perfect five stars without them.
Great game
